bill_title: appropriate money for heating costs at postsecondary technical institutes.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to appropriate money for heating costs at postsecondary technical institutes. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the state general fund the sum of three hundred thirty-three thousand dollars ($ 333,000 ) to the state auditor for distribution to the four public postsecondary technical institutes for heating and energy costs. The institutes shall submit to the state auditor statements of heating and energy costs for the months of October 2005 to March 2006, and the state auditor shall distribute the money appropriated in this Act on a proportional basis. Section 2. The state auditor shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2007, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
